description: Title 24 CF-1R compliance report forms composited on a single sheet (approximately pages 4-10 of a 10-page CF1R-PLB-01-E set). Includes building envelope fenestration summary, compliance results/EDR margins, HVAC system data, water heating specs, and mandatory measures. Performance compliance method, Climate Zone 8.
key_content: VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: individual EDR compliance margins (heating, cooling, water heating)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: HVAC system type and efficiency ratings (SEER2, HSPF2, AFUE)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: water heater type and UEF rating
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: opaque envelope U-factors (ceiling, wall, floor)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: insulation R-values (wall, ceiling, floor)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: duct insulation R-value and sealing method
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: compliance software name and version
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specs (required for new detached ADU per Title 24 â€” may be on separate form or not included)

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R building envelope fenestration summary table (U-Factor 0.30, SHGC 0.23 all orientations)
CF-1R compliance results summary with EDR margins table
CF-1R mandatory measures / HVAC system specifications
Additional CF-1R compliance data and registration information
